page.title: 10A DAY AT SHREWTON SCHOOL
page.content: The bell rang at 8.55 a.m. We lined up and then led into school. Mr. England our teacher called the register, then it was time for assembly in the hall. Our first lesson was English, and I wrote about our visit to H.M.S. Victory at Portsmouth. At break time I had my bottle of milk, then went out to play in the playground. The bell went and our class went into the Library for our Maths lesson with the Headmaster. At 12 O'clock it was lunch time. We had roast pork, potatoes, cabbage and carrots, followed by lemon meringue pie. At 1 O'clock back in our classroom, I started my project and did some drawings for my folder. After play it was our Music lesson with Mrs. Annetts The school day finished at 3.10 p.m., and I caught the school bus home.
